node.name: Thematic Investment
node.description: Designing thematic investment feature & referral system for users to invest in sectors or industries of their interests and refer their friends to start investing with Jitta Wealth.
node.myRole: As a lead designer, I worked directly with the CEO and a product manager to ideate user experience for the feature and gather product and business requirements. I explored UI options and got feedback from both product and development teams before finalizing the design and writing a product spec to hand off the project.
node.results: A working feature that provided an additional investment strategy for users and increased 60% of the company's total assets under management (AUM) within the first 3 months after its launch.

node.name: Custom Form Builder
node.description: Researching the creation process of construction forms and designing a platform for users to create custom forms.

node.name: Hacker Application Portal
node.description: Designing a unique comic-themed application portal for applicants to submit their personal information and answer questions.
node.myRole: I was a lead designer, working with an application lead, a graphic designer and a team of 4 developers on this project.
node.results: A working responsive application portal used by over 7000+ applicants around the world to apply for Canada's biggest hackathon.

node.name: User Account Management
node.description: Building tools for administrators to monitor and manage users accounts.
node.myRole: As a lead designer, I worked with the product manager to gather requirements and participated in design critiques to get design feedback. I also ran a usability inspection to test each variation of my design. In the end, I wrote a design spec to hand off the project to a team of remote developers.
node.results: High-fidelity wireframes ready for developers to implement.
